Is there a way to check if an email is a standard vs automated email via a HubL variable?

Use case:
We want to use a more meaningful UTM tagging structure in our emails - and we created a custom HubL variable that would build a standard UTM string that we could use on links eg:

```{% set base_utms = 'utm_source=hs_automation&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=' ~ content.campaign_name|urlencode ~ '&utm_content=' ~ page_meta.name|urlencode %}```
We want to keep the standard `hs_email` and `hs_automation` values for the `utm_source` variables - but I need a way to detect if an email template is being used for an automated or standard email.
